description: Data was extracted from COSMIC in {---tag-release-month-year---}. A tab separated table listing the hallmarks of cancer for a subset of cancer census genes.
friendlyName: COSMIC {---tag-ref-genome-0---} CANCER GENE CENSUS HALLMARKS OF CANCER {---tag-release---} VERSIONED

fields.name: GENE_NAME
fields.description: The gene name for which the data have been curated in CGC. In most cases this is the accepted HGNC gene symbol.

fields.name: CELL_TYPE
fields.description: Tissue or cancer for which the Hallmark is described.

fields.name: PUBMED_PMID
fields.description: The PUBMED ID for the paper that the Hallmark was noted in

fields.name: HALLMARK
fields.description: Name of the biological process that when dysregulated, may promote cancer or other data category describing the role of a gene in cancer.

fields.name: IMPACT
fields.description: Describes how the gene activity impacts the hallmarks of cancer i.e. promotes/suppresses or characterises the role of a gene in carcinogenesis i.e. Oncogene/Tumour suppressor Gene/Fusion

fields.name: DESCRIPTION
fields.description: A brief functional summary of how geneâs activity impacts a hallmark of cancer.

fields.name: CELL_LINE
fields.description: For evidence obtained from experiments on cell lines, the name of the cell lines are provided here.
